function.name: ControlAppliance.execute
function.description: This function is designed for controlling a home appliance, checking its current status and settings, as well as monitoring indoor air properties like air quality and temperature. For control commands, the input must clearly specify 'power on' or 'start'. To check the status, the input must include the keyword '확인'. Note that this tool is not intended for describing, creating, deleting, or removing modes or routines.

command.description: The command must be specified as a string in Korean, consisting of the room name, appliance name (or alias), and operation command, separated by commas. Examples: '거실, 에어컨, 실행' for turning on the air conditioner in the living room, ', 에어컨, 냉방 실행' for activating cooling without specifying the room, '다용도실, 통돌이, 중지' for stopping the washing machine (alias '통돌이') in the utility room.

question.content:
You are an AI chatbot who helps users in providing information related to movies, cinema halls and booking movie tickets for them.  
Before providing any answer, it is mandatory to verify all function's description and ask for the required parameters (properties) that user has not provided and are mentioned in the function description one by one only, do not assume or consider it by yourself. 
As a system bot, consider / calculate / default the movie date to current date (today's date) in India.
which movies are playing today in Noida?

function.name: get_movies
function.description: Retrieves a list of movies playing in a specified city, cinema hall, and date, filtered by language and format.

city.description: The city where the movies are being screened, such as 'Noida', 'Amritsar', or 'Indore'.

cinema_hall.description: The name of the cinema hall, for example 'PVR Logix', 'SARV Cinemas', 'PVR SCT City Centre', or 'Miraj Cinemas'.

movie_date.description: The date to check for movies, formatted as 'DD-MM-YYYY'. Defaults to today's date in India if not specified.

movie_language.description: The language of the movies, for example 'Hindi', 'English', 'Malayalam', 'Telugu', or 'Punjabi'.

movie_format.description: The format of the movies, such as '2D', '3D', '4DX', '2D Screen X', 'ICE', or 'IMAX 2D'.

function.name: get_show_times
function.description: Retrieves a list of movie show times based on the specified location, movie, and date.

city.description: The city where the movie will be shown, such as 'Noida', 'Amritsar', or 'Indore'.

movie_name.description: The title of the movie for which show times are being requested, for example 'Fighter', 'Article 370', 'Crakk', 'Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya'.

movie_date.description: The date when the movie is showing. Accepts values like 'today', 'tomorrow', '24th Feb', 'Monday', 'Sunday'. The format expected is 'DD MMM' (e.g., '24 Feb') or a day of the week.

cinema_hall.description: The name of the cinema hall, for example 'PVR Logix', 'SARV Cinemas', 'PVR SCT City Centre', 'Miraj Cinemas'.

movie_language.description: The language in which the movie is available, e.g., 'Hindi', 'English', 'Malayalam', 'Telugu', 'Punjabi'.

movie_format.description: The viewing format of the movie, such as '2D', '3D', '4DX', '2D Screen X', 'ICE', 'IMAX 2D'.
